Below is the entire README placed inside one single code-block so you can copy it in one go.
Click anywhere inside the grey block, press Ctrl +A (or Cmd +A) to select all, then Ctrl +C to copy.
After that, paste it into your README . md file and save.

markdown O) Copy

# Intelligent Excuse Generator

FastAPI service that produces believable excuses, stores history, ranks by score,
and simulates an emergency SMS—powered by Google Gemini (via LangChain).

##1-
~**bash
git clone https://github.com/Bhuvan—Arora—1313/excuse-generator.git
cd excuse-generator

python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

Setup

# Windows: .venv\Scripts\activate

Create a . env file:

©) Copy
